name: Shopping Sort
description:
Are you a shopping beast? Are you ready to exploit the best deals and make the most of your cash? Then this is the game for you!

In Shopping Sort you play as a shopping professional, always on the lookout for the newest promotions. Get ready and train to buy things on the cheap!

Features:
- Compare prices
- Use coupons and discounts
- Make the best decisions to buy things on the cheap!

Make good decisions and save money! Use them again to buy even more and get the best deals! Shopping has never been this fun!
